This marketing list is ideal for contacting Child Care Centres all around Australia, it is a comprehensive list which includes addresses, phone numbers and email addresses where available, for use with Microsoft Excel. This list includes the Business Name, Address, Suburb, State, Postcode, Phone Number and Fax, Email and Website where available. Delivered as a Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet for use with Excel 97 onwards.

This database can also be used by training and job placement providers, advertising companies, such as magazine and newspapers, EFTPOS systems installers, office supplies, computer equipment, display shelving providers.

Posca Paint Pens Australia

http://www.poscart.com.au/

Visit the Poscart website to buy your Posca paint pens and paint markers online. They send all around Australia and even internationally. The sell a whole range of colours and various nib sizes and styles from bullet point to chisel points in different thicknesses, usually measured in millimetres. These are distributed by Cloud Office Supplies. Based on the NSW and QLD border who have been providing quality office supplies and business machines to large and small corporate business in the local area and beyond for over 8 years.

Planhorse

http://www.planhorseonline.com.au/

This is a new niche website by Cloud Office Supplies. The Planhorse site is setup specifically as a sales point to sell plan drawers for storage of various plans and even artwork for any industry or individual who may want to keep their paper work organised in a systematic manner. Plan trolleys and wallr racks are sold singularly or as a buindled kit which includes and assortment of accessories including clams and other file suspension type systems for large files and plans

Planhorse Clamps

http://www.planhorseonline.com.au/planhorse-clamps/

Sold by Planhorse online is the copmplete range of plan horse systems, These include plan clamps, trolleys, wall racks as well as cost effective bundle deals which include the most practical solutions for hanging plans, large files and paperwork.

Posca Pens

http://www.poscart.com.au/

when doing your artwork, it pays to have a variety of colours in different nib thicknesses. depending on what you are drawing and the effect you desire from your Posca Pens, you may choose either the bullet point over the chisel point paint marker in some cases. The bullet point is more consistant, where as the chisel point marker you can get a variety of different effects and line thickness by rotating the nib to have a different contact point from the chisel nib.

List of Australian Banks

http://mavenmarketing.com.au/list-of-banks-in-australia/

Depending on the scale of the operation and to your current network of contacts is, it can be very difficult to market to banks in Australia. Banks have a certain hierarchy and mode of operation which is governed by their CEO and their Board of Directors. Depending on the size and scale of your product or operation you wish to sell to banks would depend on who you were target to sell or implement your products and services into the bank's systems. Localise services to banks such as contract cleaning, rubbish removal, maintenance of electrical equipment, office supplies and stationery, and security services are often done on a local scale. The person to contact would either be the branch manager all the regional manager for that bank who would then review your product or service, compare it to what they are currently using and make sure that firstly whatever you do will not breach the security of their operations, will operate in a professional manner make their job easier, and then be

Hospitality Supplies

http://www.mavensupplies.com.au/

Maven Hospitality Supplies is a supplier for businesses in the Hospitality sector who supplies the range of product most commonly used by Cafes, Restaurant, Hotels, Serviced Apartments, Resorts and Clubs. The Maven Supplies Mission is “To use the most efficient processes possible to supply customers at the right price, with the best service possible.” With this mission in mind they are re-writing the way Hospitality Suppliers do business in a changing world. Previously this industry was led by Companies driven by a real sales approach, pricing was kept a secret and never displayed publicly. These old school suppliers would lure customers in with their promise of being able to supply everything under the one roof, use a pushy salesperson to sign you up on a contract, and lock you in with a handful of cheap products, so they could supply the rest of the range at massively inflated prices. This business model has worked for many years with other large companies, but with the internet,

List of Builders

http://mavenmarketing.com.au/list-of-builders-in-australia/

Ideal for researching Builders in a new area. As every Builder is listed, you can review every one for a job you need done or a development within a Specific area. Not just the ones that have advertised or you currently know of. This way you can then select the best one or get a range of quotes easily for a job, so you get the best price and Tradesperson for your job. We have compiled a List of all the Builders in Australia, which is separated by each type. We originally did this for our own marketing, and have found that there is a great need to have access to such information in a single list. This will save you the time of having to search and sort through hundreds of pages online to compile the information yourself.
